title: website: more js code editor breakage
body:
Before filing a bug, please check whether it has been fixed since the
latest release. Search the issue tracker and check that you're running the
latest version of Go:

Run "go version" and compare against
http://golang.org/doc/devel/release.html  If a newer version of Go exists,
install it and retry what you did to reproduce the problem.

Thanks.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. Use Mac OS X Chrome Version 22.0.1215.0 dev
2. Go to http://tour.golang.org/
3. Click anywhere below 'import "fmt"'
4. Insert or delete a character
5. The entire editor buffer goes blank
6. The same thing happens at http://play.golang.org/, but there is a simple mode link in
the corner that works around the editor problem.
7. The tour site needs that simple mode link, and for it to persist for the entire tour

What is the expected output?
Normal editor behavior

What do you see instead?
Editor went blank (if you hit %A you can see it, but then the editor is broken)

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
unknown

Which operating system are you using?
MAC OS X 10.7.4, 1; Chrome Version 22.0.1215.0 dev

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
unknown

Please provide any additional information below.
Very off-putting for the very first thing to I try to fail.
The sort of thing that makes people say "Go is not ready"
